patterns_applied.exactOptionalPropertyTypes: Use spread operator with conditional checks: ...(value !== undefined && { key: value })
patterns_applied.indexSignatureAccess: Use bracket notation for index signature properties: obj['property'] instead of obj.property
patterns_applied.undefinedChecks: Add explicit undefined checks before using potentially undefined values

key_fixes.audit-logger.ts: Fixed AuditEvent optional property assignments using conditional spread
key_fixes.command-whitelist.ts: Added undefined check for firstArg before array includes
key_fixes.crypto-utils.ts: Added undefined check for bytes array access
key_fixes.security-middleware.ts: Fixed SecurityContext assignments and index signature access
key_fixes.native.ts: Fixed pid assignment with undefined check
key_fixes.session.ts: Changed metadata property access to bracket notation
